headline.main: PHILIPPINES 'MOP-UP' STILL ENGAGES JAPAN; Tokyo Admits U.S. and Filipino Resistance Continues

lead_paragraph: Imperial Japanese headquarters announced yesterday "the virtual termination of mopping-up operations in the Philippines" against American and Filipino remnants holding out in mountainous or other inaccessible parts of the islands, according to Tokyo broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press.
abstract: Jap rept on mopping-up operations, PI, and US-Filipino casualties and men and materiel taken, Aug-Oct
